com.adsboard.controller

Class MyAdsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adsboard.controller.MyAdsController

  • @Controller
public class MyAdsController
extends java.lang.Object
    Project Ads board. This Controller class is used for control of /myads pages Implements the display and CRUD operations with ads of user
    Since:
    October 30, 2015
    Author:
    Oleksandr Lukichov
